trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_SEQ_00<tab>Seigetsu the Enlightened would enlist your talent for enlisting others.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Gyotaku.
TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_TODO_01<tab>Ride a mikoshi to the edges of Nhaama's Retreat and use the Wasshoi ability for the Namazu gatherers.
TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_TODO_02<tab>Report to Seigetsu the Enlightened.

TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_000<tab>The mikoshi you helped us construct has made quite an impact on our people. We are currently in the process of building several more, but I fear their worth is significantly reduced if there are no bearers to parade them around...

TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_001<tab>Thankfully, in this case, my people are a simple breed. By merely demonstrating the majestic spectacle of our mikoshi in their immediate vicinity, they will soon clamor for the honor of bearing the load.

TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_002<tab>Go now to Gyotaku, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Claim a mikoshi, and soar across the steppe to where our gatherers toil on the edges of Nhaama's Retreat. The allure of your resounding “wasshoi” will not be denied!
TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_GYOTAKU_000_020<tab>Ready for your mikoshi? Up you go, then! Give those boys and girls a good “wasshoi” from me!

TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_GYOTAKU_000_021<tab>When the others returned with the mikoshi, I had thought your task successfully completed. But it seems you simply hopped down...or tumbled off. Here, why don't you try again, and keep a tighter grip this time, yes, yes?
TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_DAILYNAMAZUO03121A_000_022<tab>How colorful and festive! When do <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> ever get to scatter confetti with wild abandon?
TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_DAILYNAMAZUO03121B_000_023<tab>All we earn from this job is dry skin and skinned fins! We should head back and sign up to be mikoshi bearers!
TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_DAILYNAMAZUO03121C_000_024<tab>Oh, have you come to lift our spirits!? Banish the drabness? There truly is nothing worth collecting around here...
TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_DAILYNAMAZUO03121D_000_025<tab>Just Namazu-colored sand...and more Namazu-colored sand. I can't take this anymore! I quit! “Mikoshi bearer” is my true calling!
TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_DAILYNAMAZUO03121E_000_026<tab>Oho! What a lively crew! Rambunctious! And here we are working our fins to the gristle...

TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_DAILYNAMAZUO03121F_000_027<tab>Why don't <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> join the mikoshi bearers and enjoy ourselves for a change? Anything's better than grubbing in the mud! Yes, yes!
TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_DAILYNAMAZUO03121G_100_027<tab>We Namazu were hatched to enjoy life─not slave away at these dreary chores! I want an exciting job like the mikoshi bearers!
TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_DAILYNAMAZUO03121H_110_027<tab>Me too! This gathering nonsense can sink in the river for all I care!

TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_SYSTEM_000_028<tab>These Namazu are busy harvesting supplies for the festival. Speak with Gyotaku at Dhoro Iloh to mount a mikoshi, and perform a rousing Wasshoi for the Namazu gatherers.

TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_030<tab>The effect of your demonstration has been all but instantaneous─we have already accepted several applications for our bearer positions. <sigh> The fact that my kin are so easily influenced is a blessing on occasion.

TEXT_BANNAM507_03121_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_031<tab>I have it on good authority, however, that the physical labor of a mikoshi bearer takes a terrible toll on the body. We shall have shirkers and deserters aplenty within the week, and will soon be calling again upon your powers of persuasion...
